sentences.english: The RTP condition of fluorene and acenaphthene on the bonded filter paper was examined in detail.
sentences.chinese: 详细的考察了芴和苊在修饰滤纸上室温磷光条件。

sentences.english: Besides this, Javert possessed in his eye the feline phosphorescence of night birds.
sentences.chinese: 况且沙威的眼睛有着夜鸟那种象猫一样的磷光。

sentences.english: Phosphorescence (RTP) of halogen naphthalic anhydride at room temperature was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了卤代蔡醉的室温磷光性质。

sentences.english: This is phosphorescence of the sea, caused by plankton interacting in the water.
sentences.chinese: 这是海洋磷光，是浮游生物与水相互作用造成的。

sentences.english: The phosphorescence bands on stamps of 8 different countries were examined.
sentences.chinese: 曾测验过8个不同国家的邮票上的磷光带。

sentences.english: It was the yellow Gulf weed that had made so much phosphorescence in the night.
sentences.chinese: 正是这种黄色的果囊马尾藻在夜间发出很强的磷光。

sentences.english: Fractions of the phosphor are easily lost .
The brightening mechanism and the relation between phosphorescence afterglow and the temperature are described in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 叙述了磷光体的发光机理以及磷光余辉与温度的关系。

sentences.english: The brightening mechanism and the relation between phosphorescence afterglow and the temperature are described in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 叙述了磷光体的发光机理以及磷光余辉与温度的关系。

sentences.english: It was the yellow Gulf weed that had made so much phosphorescence in the night.
sentences.chinese: 那是墨西哥湾区的一种黄色海草，晚上时会发出磷光。

sentences.english: But there was only the light of its slow descent.
sentences.chinese: 但是只看到它慢慢沉下时的磷光。

sentences.english: The line showed like a phosphorescent streak in the water straight out from his shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 钓索从他肩上一直钻进水里，看来像一道磷光。

sentences.english: He saw the phosphorescence of the Gulf weed in the water.
sentences.chinese: 他看见马尾藻在水中发出的磷光。

sentences.english: Using ultra-strong phosphorous light, with the collected light of several beams of daylight lamp.
sentences.chinese: 采用超强三磷光，具有多束灯管的光束值。

sentences.english: IC1-series for smoothing dielectric coatings and phosphor binding applications.
sentences.chinese: 系列，用于平滑介质涂层并可以直接掺入磷光粉。

definition: Taiwan variant of 熒光|荧光[ying2 guang1]
a glimmer/twinkling (of stars, phosphorescence, candlelight)/flickering light
light/beam of light/gleam of light/light reflected from an object
silvery light/bright white light/shining white light
gleaming reflection of waves in sunlight
